Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities*HSC & GRADUATES -FRESHERS / EXPERIANCED FOR CUSTOMER SERVICE PROCESS INBOUND / OUTBOUND AT KHARGAR NAVI MUMBAI* ( We do not Charge Candidates) *PROCESSES* - INBOUND INSURANCE PROCESS OROUTBOUND E COMMERCE COMPANY PROCESS OR OUTBOUND ONLINE MOVIE PORTAL PROCESS OF WELL KNOWN COMPANY *Responsibilities*:*Inbound insurance process* – Receive the calls and resolve the problems of the customers*Outbound E Commerce Process* - You have to call/ receive call from the dealers/ parties and share the details and Ask them to join the e commerce online platform for sales of their products of their products*ONLINE MOVIE PORTAL* – Call the user to join the portal for online movies The list will be provided to you *Job Location*: Kharghar , Navi Mumbai *Position* : Customer Service Executive *Timings* : DAY SHIFT ONLY ( 9 am to 6 pm)*Educational Qualification*: HSC OR Any Graduate*Experience* - 0 to 1 year ( Freshers also accepted ) *LANGUAGE* - Mixed ( Hindi & English)*Whatsapp 9821177328* ( prefer whatsapp to email for Faster processing and communication)
Functional Area: ITES, BPO, KPO, LPO, Customer Service, Operations,
UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, Graduation Not Required
